remarks: The rank of a Cartesian product when the rank of the union of its arguments is a successor ordinal.  Part of Exercise 4 of [Kunen] p. 107.  See ~ rankxplim for the limit ordinal case.  (Contributed by NM, 19-Sep-2006.)
statement:
rankxplim.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
rankxplim.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
rankxpsuc $p |- ( ( ( rank ` ( A u. B ) ) = suc C /\ ( A X. B ) =/= (/) ) -> ( rank ` ( A X. B ) ) = suc suc ( rank ` ( A u. B ) ) ) $.
